import React, {useState,useEffect} from "react"; import firebase from "firebase/compat/app"; import "firebase/compat/database"; const firebaseConfig = { apiKey: "AIzaSyBF8Q3AuT5m-iBayXDt82r8RyADUdnyGsk", databaseURL: "https://classroom-1a392-default-rtdb.asia-southeast1.firebasedatabase.app", }; firebase.initializeApp(firebaseConfig); const database = firebase.database(); const ClassA = () => { const [chrisna, setchrisna] = useState(""); const [backgroundColorChrisna, setBackgroundColorChrisna] = useState(""); const [Charlotte, setCharlotte] = useState(""); const [backgroundColorCharlotte, setBackgroundColorCharlotte] = useState(""); const [Anggi, setAnggi] = useState(""); const [backgroundColorAnggi, setBackgroundColorAnggi] = useState(""); const [Sophia, setSophia] = useState(""); const [backgroundColorSophia, setBackgroundColorSophia] = useState(""); const [Emily, setEmily] = useState(""); const [backgroundColorEmily, setBackgroundColorEmily] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { const ref1 = firebase.database().ref("ClassA/Chrisna"); ref1.on("value", (snapshot) => { const data = snapshot.val(); updateChrisna(data); }); const ref2 = firebase.database().ref("ClassA/Charlotte"); ref2.on("value", (snapshot) => { const data = snapshot.val(); updateCharlotte(data); }); const ref3 = firebase.database().ref("ClassA/Anggi"); ref3.on("value", (snapshot) => { const data = snapshot.val(); updateAnggi(data); }); const ref4 = firebase.database().ref("ClassA/Sophia"); ref4.on("value", (snapshot) => { const data = snapshot.val(); updateSophia(data); }); const ref5 = firebase.database().ref("ClassA/Sophia"); ref4.on("value", (snapshot) => { const data = snapshot.val(); updateSophia(data); }); return () => {}; }, []); const updateChrisna = (data) => { setchrisna(data); setBackgroundColorChrisna( data === "Present" ? "#84BF56" : data === "Not present" ? "#C00000" : "#565454" ); }; const updateCharlotte = (data) => { setCharlotte(data); setBackgroundColorCharlotte( data === "Present" ? "#84BF56" : data === "Not present" ? "#C00000" : "#565454" ); }; const updateAnggi = (data) => { setAnggi(data); setBackgroundColorAnggi( data === "Present" ? "#84BF56" : data === "Not present" ? "#C00000" : "#565454" ); }; const updateSophia = (data) => { setSophia(data); setBackgroundColorSophia( data === "Present" ? "#84BF56" : data === "Not present" ? "#C00000" : "#565454" ); }; return (
Class A
); }; export default ClassA;
